snippet.title: Katanga (Video Game Trailer 2019)
snippet.description:
Graduation Video Game 
School : ISART DIGITAL, the Video Game and 3D Animation / VFX School

Katanga is a first-person horror game, taking place during the 1920s in a nightmarish and dystopian Belgian Congo, where the player character is a former slave. After having your soul extracted by an experimental machine, you face a powerful and horrifying creature. To survive this deadly hunt and make yourself whole again, you must rely on your supernatural powers. All the gameplay is based around this concept, as you can project your soul in order to remotely activate electronic devices.

Platform : PC 
Engine : Unreal Engine 4
Number of players : 1
Genre :  stealth, survival horror
PEGI 18

--------------------
Projet de fin d'études
Ecole : ISART DIGITAL, l'école du jeu vidéo et de l'animation 3D-FX

Victime d'une machine à extraire l'âme, vous faites face à une créature monstrueuse : votre alter ego. Plongé dans un Congo Belge dystopique et effrayant, vous allez devoir survivre à cette chasse mortelle pour enfin retrouver votre intégrité.

Producer : Felix Delepine, Hugo Oliveira
Game Art : Johan Chaintrier, Line Greneche, Flore Lemoine, Benjamin Odonne
Game Programming : Matthieu de Laharpe, Tristan Naudon, William Seve
Music & Sound Design : Edouard Bourgeat

Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/KatangaTheRiverofSouls/
Ready to play Katanga? Visit https://isart-digital.itch.io/katanga
